title: Anyone having Issues with TS and League Of Legends
body: Randomly in a ranked game I was unable to connect to ts and open the league client. My internet allowed me to go on fb, steam, etc. Pretty much everything except TS and League. I unplugged and re-plugged both my gateway and router and restarted my computer like 10+ times but nothing worked.

replies.body:
There may be an issue with your network settings or your network routing that are causing this issue. I recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the common solutions.

Let me know if this helped.
